wikai-chat-welcometext: Welcome message displayed in the chatbot
wikai-chat-welcomedesc: Description message to the user, displayed in the chatbot
wikai-chat-instruction1: Instruction shown to the user in the chatbot
wikai-chat-instruction2: Instruction shown to the user in the chatbot
wikai-chat-pdftotext-error: Error message to notify the user that there is a problem with a utility setup
